page.title: 02At the Shopping Centre
page.content: Besides one out of town supermarket, there is a small shopping centre to serve a densely populated residential area.The shops in the centre are small units providing a limited range of retail variety.The newsagents is a very helpful shop.After school is the busiest time of the day.You can buy magazines and sweets.There is a selection of games.I like the birthday cards and there are some books,records and pads of paper.There is also a little post office.The post office will pay your family allowance and if you are unemployed,your unemployment benefit money.You can also get stamps and they have a bank for children to keep their savings in.The fish and chip shop is very handy if you do not want to cook at night.
